block.p: An annotated film listing in the New Season issue on Sept. 11 for ''Ballets Russes,'' opening on Oct. 26, omitted a credit. Dayna Goldfine was Daniel Geller's co-director.

An annotated pop music listing for Bobby Bare's album ''The Moon Was Blue,'' to be released on Nov. 1, credited him incorrectly with composing two of his earlier hits. ''Detroit City'' was written by Danny Dill and Mel Tillis; ''How I Got to Memphis'' was by Tom T. Hall.
An annotated film listing in the New Season issue on Sept. 11 for ''Ballets Russes,'' opening on Oct. 26, omitted a credit. Dayna Goldfine was Daniel Geller's co-director.

An annotated pop music listing for Bobby Bare's album ''The Moon Was Blue,'' to be released on Nov. 1, credited him incorrectly with composing two of his earlier hits. ''Detroit City'' was written by Danny Dill and Mel Tillis; ''How I Got to Memphis'' was by Tom T. Hall.
